  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Populates the country observable list and then populates the Country combo box with the observable list. The selected customer's information is loaded in.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable

    • onCountrySelected

      void onCountrySelected() throws SQLException
      When the user makes a choice in the country combo box, it will fetch the list of first level divisions that belong to that country.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • passCountryId

      public void passCountryId(int id) throws SQLException
      Makes a call to the getAllRelatedDivisions method in the Division query class. It will populate the first-level divisions combo box.
      Parameters:
      id - the country id
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • ClickCancel

      void ClickCancel(javafx.event.ActionEvent e) throws IOException
      Exits the add customer function without saving.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • ClickSaveCust

      void ClickSaveCust(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws SQLException, IOException
      Runs validation checks on the fields. If successful, it adds the customer to the database. It then returns to the main customer screen and refreshes the table with the update customer in the view.
      Throws:
      SQLException
      IOException

    • loadData

      public static void loadData(Customer selC)
      Loads customer data.
      Parameters:
      selC - the selected customer from the main customer screen.

    • checkCompletion

      public boolean checkCompletion()
      Check if the form fields have been filled out; used for input validation.
      Returns:
      the boolean on successful validation

    • checkLength

      public boolean checkLength()
      Checks the field lengths on text fields; used for input validation.
      Returns:
      the boolean on successful validation

    • resetFields

      public void resetFields()
      Resets the form fields.
